name: Disable Comments by click5
author: click5 Interactive

sections.description:
Best WordPress plugin to disable comments on your website and protect yourself from spammers.

Simple and easy to use plugin allowing you to take control over the comments section on your blog posts, pages, media attachments, and custom post types.

Main plugin features include:

  • ability to globally disable comments, trackbacks and pingbacks for all the post types, including custom post types
  • ability to disable comments, trackbacks and pingbacks for selected post types
  • ability to disable external REST API and XML-RPC comments

sections.installation:
AUTOMATIC INSTALLATION

Automatic installation method is the easiest and most recommended option.

  1. Log in to your WordPress Dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click on ‚ÄúAdd New‚Äù.
  2. Enter ‚Äòclick5‚Äô (without quotes) in the search field and click the ‚ÄòSearch Plugins‚Äô button.
  3. On the list of search results, click the ‘Install Now’ button for the ‘Disable Comments by click5’ plugin.
  4. Then click the red ‘Active’ button to finalize the installation.
  5. You will be automatically redirected to the plugin Settings page, where you can disable comments and configure plugin settings.

MANUAL INSTALLATION

  1. Download the plugin and unzip the contents. You should see a single folder named ‘disable-comments-by-click5’.
  2. Connect to the FTP server with your WordPress installation.
  3. Upload the ‘disable-comments-by-click5’ plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder on your FTP server.
  4. Continue to step 3 of Automatic Installation instructions above.

Does it support Custom Post Types?

Yes, our plugin supports Custom Post Types and allows to disable comments for selected Custom Post Types.
